text: Marnie Schulenburg (May 21, 1984 â€“ May 17, 2022) was an American actress. She was known for her role as Alison Stewart on the CBS soap opera As the World Turns from 2007 until 2010. Schulenburg was born in Cape Cod, Massachusetts. Her career began in 2007. She also had roles in One Life to Live and Tainted Dreams. Schulenburg was diagnosed with terminal breast cancer in May 2020. She died from the disease at a hospital in Bloomfield, New Jersey, four days before her 38th birthday. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Massachusetts
title: Marnie Schulenburg
